description: A raw data object containing all fonts data in Linku

additionalProperties.description: Info on a font for Toki Pona

id.description: The font's unique ID, identifying it among other fonts

author.description: a list of this font's authors

features.description: a list of features this font supports

filename.description: the name of the file this font is stored in at https://github.com/lipu-linku/ijo

last_updated.description: the rough date of this font's last update

license.description: an SPDX expression describing this font's license: https://spdx.org/licenses/

style.description: the general style of this font

ucsur.description: whether this font conforms to the UCSUR standard: https://www.kreativekorp.com/ucsur/charts/sitelen.html

version.description: the current version of this font

writing_system.description: the writing system this font uses as its script

fontfile.description: a link to the font file published by the original author (not the mirror on the Linku Project's GitHub)

repo.description: a link to a web hosted repository of this font's source files (usually hosted on GitHub or GitLab)

webpage.description: a link to this font's home page, usually showcasing its features and usage/installation

__schema0.description: A unique identifier for an object in Linku. Generally named after the object.

__schema1.description: A URL pointing to some external resource.
